class.name: FmodAudioServer
class.brief_description: FmodAudioServer is a high level interface for interacting with the FMOD api. Integrated with godot;

method.name: any_sample_data_loading
method.description: if [code]true[/code] Sample data in a bank or event is currently.

method.name: get_singleton
method.description: Retrieves the FmodAudioServer instance.

method.name: has_bank_loaded
method.description: if [code]true[/code] bank with the given name is loaded. false if not loaded or no such bank exists

method.name: have_all_banks_loaded
method.description: if [code]true[/code] if all banks in the audio server have finished loading. (currently always true since it's loaded synchonously)

method.name: load_bank
method.description: loads the bank given bank_name. bank_name can be of 2 formats a path to the file or "bank:/". If using "bank:/" it will search the banks directory specified in project settings based for a file with name after the slash "/" without the .bank file extension

method.name: path_to_guid
method.description: Looks up the guid of the given path. The Strings bank must be loaded.

method.name: play_one_shot_2d_attached_by_id
method.description: Plays and attaches fmod event (from guid) to node2D. Tracks position and optionally velocity.

method.name: play_one_shot_2d_attached_by_path
method.description: Plays and attaches fmod event (from path) to node2D. Tracks position and optionally velocity.

method.name: play_one_shot_3d_attached_by_id
method.description: Plays and attaches fmod event (from guid) to node3D. Tracks position and optionally velocity.

method.name: play_one_shot_3d_attached_by_path
method.description: Plays and attaches fmod event (from path) to node3D tracks position and optionally velocity.

method.name: play_one_shot_by_id
method.description: Plays one shot event at world position (from guid). In 2D Z is normally zero

method.name: play_one_shot_by_path
method.description: Plays one shot event at world position(from path). In 2D Z is normally zero. Strings bank must be loaded.

method.name: play_one_shot_rigid_2d_attached_by_path
method.description: Plays one shot event (from path) and attaches it to rigidbody. Tracks position and velocity

method.name: play_one_shot_rigid_body2d_attached_by_id
method.description: Plays one shot event (from guid) and attaches it to rigidbody. Tracks position and velocity

method.name: play_one_shot_rigid_body3d_attached_by_id
method.description: Plays one shot event (from guid) and attaches it to rigidbody. Tracks position and velocity

method.name: play_one_shot_rigid_body3d_attached_by_path
method.description: Plays one shot event (from path) and attaches it to rigidbody. Tracks position and velocity. Strings bank must be loaded.

method.name: set_listener_2d_location
method.description: Sets the fmod listener to copy transform and velocity of node and position of attenuation object

method.name: set_listener_2d_rigidbody_location
method.description: Sets the fmod listener to copy transform and velocity of node and position of attenuation object

method.name: set_listener_3d_location
method.description: Sets the fmod listener to copy transform and velocity of node and position of attenuation object

method.name: set_listener_3d_rigidbody_location
method.description: Sets the fmod listener to copy transform and velocity of node and position of attenuation object

method.name: unload_banks
method.description: Sets the fmod listener to copy transform and velocity of node and position of attenuation object
